name: Afraid
description: Cannot take Reactions. Must roll DC 12 Resilience to use an Action. On failure, you move away from the source of fear a number of units equal to half the difference. On success, the condition ends. Each failure lowers the DC by 1.

name: Bleeding
description: Take 1 damage at the end of your turn. Can be stopped with a successful Medicine check or magical healing.

name: Blinded
description: -1 die on all Attack rolls and Defense rolls (Evasion or Deflection). Cannot make visual checks.

name: Broken
description: Resolve is 0. Cannot regain Resolve. All Mind checks (Resilience, Concentration, Logic, Senses) suffer a -1 die penalty. Must make a DC 10 check during a Favorable Rest (Resilience or Concentration) to recover.

name: Charmed
description: You are under the influence of another creature. Cannot target them with hostile actions. May obey commands.

name: Confused
description: Each turn, roll 1d4: (1) attack random target, (2) move in a random direction, (3) lose your Action, (4) act normally.

name: Dazed
description: Cannot use Concentration. Cannot take reactions. Ends at the end of your next turn automatically.

name: Energized
description: Regenerate +1 extra energy per round. Optional: +1 movement speed. Ends after 2 rounds or upon becoming Winded.

name: Impaired
description: You cannot move. -1 die on both Attack rolls and Defense checks. Cannot use 2-handed weapons effectively. Applies to being Grappled, tangled, hobbled, etc.

name: Incapacitated
description: You cannot take Actions, Reactions, or Movement. Automatically fail physical defense checks. Affects sleeping, paralyzed, frozen, or unconscious states.

name: Maddened
description: You attack allies and cannot distinguish friend from foe. All targets are treated as hostile.

name: Numbed
description: Cannot gain or lose Resolve. Cannot use Resolve to stay up at 0 Health.

name: Obscured
description: You are undetected by normal senses. Encompasses being invisible, hidden, or obscured by terrain or magic. You cannot be directly targeted unless a creature succeeds on a relevant detection check (Senses, Magic, etc.). Attackers have Disadvantage; your attacks gain +1 die if undetected.

name: Prone
description: You are on the ground. Movement is halved. Melee attackers gain +1 die against you. Ranged attackers have Disadvantage.

name: Stunned
description: Cannot take Actions or Reactions. Requires a DC 10 Resilience, Concentration, or Endurance check to recover. The DC is reduced by 1 after each failed attempt.

name: Weakened
description: You deal -1 damage with all attacks and abilities. Optional: also take -1 die on Might or Endurance checks.

name: Winded
description: Cannot regenerate energy. Ends after taking a Rest Action.
